is.erle.captain

Class IsErleCaptainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactivespaces.activity.impl.ActivitySupport
      • interactivespaces.activity.impl.BaseActivity
        • interactivespaces.activity.impl.ros.BaseRosActivity
          • interactivespaces.activity.impl.ros.BaseRoutableRosActivity
            • is.erle.captain.IsErleCaptainActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    interactivespaces.activity.Activity, interactivespaces.activity.ActivityControl, interactivespaces.activity.ros.RosActivity, interactivespaces.activity.SupportedActivity

    public class IsErleCaptainActivity
extends interactivespaces.activity.impl.ros.BaseRoutableRosActivity
    IsErleCaptainActivity is class which handles all tasks a real Captain of a Drone would handle. This class extends BaseRoutableRosActivity class to use its publihser/subscriber modules.

    This activity receives data from mavlink activity. It monitors the remote Drone using this data. It has sendCommand method which allows to command mavlink activity. It can command any drone using this simple sendCommand function. All it has to do is to send a command from a list of Commands.

    It will act as the captain of the mission. It will arm/disarm the motors, it will make sure that all of the text file has been transmitted before letting the drone fly. It will see drone's neighbourhood, battery status, current and planned course and all other things which a drone pilot has to do to maintain the safety of the drone and its surroundings. It monitors heartbeat of the drones and maintains data about the connected drones.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Abhay Kumar

    • Field Detail

      • heartbeatThread

        private interactivespaces.util.concurrency.ManagedCommand heartbeatThread
        A thread to process the heartbeat messages. It processes heartbeat messages and removes any disconnected drones. Basically it manages a Map of connected drones.

      • rcOutput

        private interactivespaces.util.concurrency.ManagedCommand rcOutput
        A rc output thread.

      • commandSender

        private interactivespaces.util.concurrency.ManagedCommand commandSender
        Sends commands read from a command.txt file as soon as the file is available.Does nothing with the file, so you will have to manually delete it after sending commands. The file pattern is first the command from CommandOptions enum, followed by its arguments separated by a single space.

      • publishers

        private static java.lang.String[] publishers
        The topic names for publishing data PUBLISHER MAPPING publishers[0] -> output Topic Name : captain/output Usage : Send command to the mavlink activity to execute some functions. publishers[1] -> rc_output Topic Name : captain/rc_output Usage : Send RC output to the mavlink activity.

      • subscribers

        private static java.lang.String[] subscribers
        The topic names for subscribing data SUBSCRIBER MAPPING subscribers[0] -> input Topic Name : captain/input Usage : Receive data from mavlink activity and process response. subscribers[1] -> inputWP Topic Name : mavlink/heartbeat Usage : Receive data from mavlink activity about heartbeat message and process it. subscribers[2] -> WP_Processor Topic Name : waypoint/processor/output Usage : Receive start data from waypoiny processor activity about starting a mission.

      • heartbeatLastUpdate

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.Byte,java.util.Date> heartbeatLastUpdate
        A HashMap containing the last heartbeat message of a particular drone id. It gets removed if that drone doesn't send data for more than 20s.

      • cmdReturn

        private static int cmdReturn
        A Global variale to store the response received after a command from the mavlink activity. VALUE TABLE cmdReturn=0 -> SUCCESS cmdReturn=-1 -> TIMEOUT cmdReturn=-2 -> BADCMD cmdReturn=-3 -> NULL cmdReturn= +ve value -> FAIL CODE

      • readWaypointList

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> readWaypointList
        A List of String arrays containing waypoint data read from the drone DATA MAPPING FOR STRING ARRAY Index 0 -> INDEX Index 1 -> CURRENT WP Index 2 -> COORD FRAME Index 3 -> COMMAND Index 4 -> PARAM1 Index 5 -> PARAM2 Index 6 -> PARAM3 Index 7 -> PARAM4 Index 8 -> PARAM5/X/LONGITUDE Index 9 -> PARAM6/Y/LATITUDE Index 10 -> PARAM7/Z/ALTITUDE Index 11 -> AUTOCONTINUE

      • sendCommand

        private int sendCommand(IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions opt,
                        byte targetSystem,
                        byte targetComponent,
                        int timeout)
        Sends a command to the mavlink activity to perform some action. Used to execute a function with the arguments target system and target component in the mavlink activity. The command will be sent to the target system and default target component value supplied here.
        Parameters:
        opt - Command from the command option list.
        timeout - Timeout Period of the command.
        targetSystem - Target drone to send command to.
        targetComponent - Target component on the drone.
        Returns:
        Response from the mavlink activity. value = 0 -> SUCCESS, value =-1 -> TIMEOUT, value=-2 -> BADCMD, value=-3 -> NULL, value= +ve -> FAIL CODE
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        cmdReturnCheck(int), IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions

      • sendCommand

        private int sendCommand(IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions opt)
        Sends a command to the mavlink activity to perform some action. This function has no command arguments. Used to execute a function without arguments in the mavlink activity. The command will be sent to the default target system and default target component set in the mavlink activity.
        Parameters:
        opt - Command from the command option list.
        Returns:
        Response from the mavlink activity. value = 0 -> SUCCESS, value =-1 -> TIMEOUT, value=-2 -> BADCMD, value=-3 -> NULL, value= +ve -> FAIL CODE
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        cmdReturnCheck(int), IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions

        private int sendCommand(IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions opt,
                        java.lang.String[] param,
                        int timeout)
        Sends a command to the mavlink activity to perform some action. The command argument comes in a String array format.
        Parameters:
        opt - Command from the command option list.
        param - Contains the command arguments as a string array. This follows the parameters of the command as explained in the CommandOptions enum.
        timeout - Timeout Period of the command.
        Returns:
        Response from the mavlink activity. value = 0 -> SUCCESS, value =-1 -> TIMEOUT, value=-2 -> BADCMD, value=-3 -> NULL, value= +ve -> FAIL CODE

        private int sendCommand(IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions opt,
                        java.lang.String param,
                        int timeout)
        Sends a command to the mavlink activity to perform some action. The command argument comes in a String separated by '=' separator.
        Parameters:
        opt - Command from the command option list.
        param - Contains the command arguments as a string separated by '=' separator. This follows the parameters of the command as explained in the CommandOptions enum.

      • sendCommand

        private int sendCommand(java.lang.String cmd,
                        int timeout)
        Sends a command to the mavlink activity to perform some action. The command comes in a String whose first element always contains CommandOptions ordinal value. After this follows the other arguments required for the function.
        Parameters:
        cmd - Contains the command as a string separated by '=' separator. The first value is always a CommandOption's ordinal value. After this follows the parameters of the command as explained in the CommandOptions enum. They are separated by '='.
        timeout - Timeout Period of the command.
        Returns:
        Response from the mavlink activity. value = 0 -> SUCCESS, value =-1 -> TIMEOUT, value=-2 -> BADCMD, value=-3 -> NULL, value= +ve -> FAIL CODE
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        cmdReturnCheck(int), IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions

      • sendCommand

        private int sendCommand(java.lang.String cmd)
        Sends a command to the mavlink activity to perform some action. The command comes in a String whose first element always contains CommandOptions ordinal value. After this follows the other arguments required for the function.
        Parameters:
        cmd - Contains the command as a string separated by '=' separator. The first value is always a CommandOption's ordinal value. After this follows the parameters of the command as explained in the CommandOptions enum. They are separated by '='.
        Returns:
        Response from the mavlink activity. value = 0 -> SUCCESS, value =-1 -> TIMEOUT, value=-2 -> BADCMD, value=-3 -> NULL, value= +ve -> FAIL CODE
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        cmdReturnCheck(int), IsErleCaptainActivity.CommandOptions

      • cmdReturnCheck

        private int cmdReturnCheck(int timeout)
        Waits for the response of a command until a timeout period. After the timeout or response from the mavlink activity, it returns the command status. This function makes a synchronized update to the global cmdReturn variable to make it to have the default value.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Time to wait for the response from mavlink activity.
        Returns:
        value = 0 -> SUCCESS, value =-1 -> TIMEOUT, value=-2 -> BADCMD, value=-3 -> NULL, value= +ve -> FAIL CODE
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • onNewInputJson

        public void onNewInputJson(java.lang.String channelName,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> message)
        Callback for new message on the subscribed topics. Processes incoming messages.
        Overrides:
        onNewInputJson in class interactivespaces.activity.impl.ros.BaseRoutableRosActivity
        Parameters:
        channelName - Channel name of incoming message
        message - Message stored in a key-value pair in a map
        Since:

        See Also:
        BaseRoutableRosActivity, Map

      • startFlying

        private void startFlying()
        Send sequence of commands to mavlink activity to make the drone fly autonomously according to the mission file.

      • launchRcOutputThread

        private void launchRcOutputThread()
        Launches the rc output thread. It sends rc output on rc_output channel at a frequency of 2 Hz.

      • launchCommandSenderThread

        private void launchCommandSenderThread()
        It launches a command sender thread which scans for a command.txt file every second. If it finds a command file, it sends it to the mavlink activity to be sent to the drone. The command file follows the convention of first command being the CommandOptions ordinal value followed by its arguments.Every argument is separated by " " separator and each line contains only one command.

      • setParams

        private void setParams()
        Set parameters on the drone from a Param.param file. The file contains the parameter name followed by a space followed by a value. Each line has just one parameter to be set. This function is called at the activation time.
